about_the_game:
Tropi is a horizontally-scrolling shoot 'em up set in the Caribbean Sea. You play as the titular Tropi. With the help of his friend and caretaker, Carmen, the two must go out and fight against aliens who have sprung from the Bermuda Triangle and are terrorizing the surrounding area.

Tropi has a variety of weapons under his disposal, all very different from each other. Don't try to fire aimlessly though. You need to understand that each weapon needs to be reloaded after a certain number of shots get fired.

Tropi attempts to add a certain amount of variety and strategy that is not present in many other shooters.

Will be released whenever it's ready.
